name: Collar_Explosion
display_help: The explosion has left you Disoriented.
display_target_help: The explosion has left you Disoriented.

name: Hurl_Boulder
display_help: This foe can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.

name: Jab
display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

name: Ghoulish_Inspiration
display_help: While the Ghoul Manslayer is not held he will boost the damage, chance to hit and resistance to status effects of nearby allies.
display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +DMG, +To Hit, Res(Immobilize, Sleep, Confuse, Hold, Disorient)
display_target_help: While the Ghoul Manslayer is not held he will boost the damage, chance to hit and resistance to status effects of nearby allies.
display_target_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +DMG, +To Hit, Res(Immobilize, Sleep, Confuse, Hold, Disorient)

name: Flurry_of_Fists
display_help: Unleashes a super fast Flurry of punches to pummel your foe. Flurry is so dizzying that it has a chance to Disorient the target.
display_target_help: You have been Disoriented.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

name: Marked_for_Death
display_help: Ghouls operate in pacts and it is the Painted One's duty to "mark" their prey. Being marked will cause some minor Toxic damage and cause nearby enemies to be more likely to attack you.
display_target_help: You've been marked, nearby foes may be attracted to you.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} marks you causing nearby enemies to be more likely to attack you.

name: Throw
display_help: Ghouls often throw nearby objects at their foes before they close in melee and tear them apart. This attack does moderate smashing damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Death_and_Glory

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points.

name: Resistance
display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

name: Deflection
display_help: Your mastery of the shield allows you to easily deflect melee attacks, and attacks that do get through your ironclad defenses tend to do less damage. While Deflection is active the user will gain defense to melee attacks and some minor resistance to lethal and smashing damage. Recharge: Fast
display_attacker_hit: You engage {PowerName} increasing your melee defense as well as your lethal and smashing resistance.

name: Against_all_Odds
display_help: The harder pressed you are in combat the greater your offensive abilities become. Each enemy that stands toe-to-toe with you in combat will grant you a damage bonus. The first foe you engage in melee grants the highest damage bonus, and up to 10 foes can contribute to this effect. Each foe in melee range also suffers from reduced damage as your shield deflects a portion of their damage. Recharge: Slow
display_attacker_hit: You are ready for the worst, you gain a damage bonus for each foe you engage in melee.

name: Heavy_Pulse_Blast
display_help: The Heavy Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.
display_target_help: The {PowerName} has reduced your resistance to all damage types except psionics.

name: Fast_Healing

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: Using ancient techniques, you can make yourself more resilient to pain. Thus, you can take more damage before being defeated. When you activate this power you will increase your maximum Hit Points for a couple of minutes. Recharge: Very Long
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

display_help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

name: Integration
display_help: You can Integrate your mind and body, making you resistant to Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilization effects, as well as increase your regeneration rate, for as long as you can keep this toggle power active. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +Regeneration
display_attacker_hit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep and Knockback.
